stories.text:
I'm a SaaS operator myself and I struggle with this question when the startups Founders or Investors I meet (or work with) ask me "Hey! Hows our/your cashflow looks like". I often have these numbers in my mind, but to prepare a reportable forecast, This labour intensive work requires a lot of time in calculating (Incomes/Expenses, AR and APs), creating scenarios with hiring/firing, onboarding a new vendor, or implementing new feature within a product, that requires working with different tools and integrations.

Quickly Preparing a 'readable' work reports is a pain. What tools are you using or have identified to solve this problem.
stories.title: How do you deal with Cashflow Management?
